forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 16 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 16 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As day breaks over Downtown San Francisco, one finds the morning shrouded in a veil of clouds, the city’s iconic skyline just partly revealed. There's an air of anticipation, as the cool and gentle breeze carries the echo of waves from the bay. The chilly embrace of 53 degrees invites a layered approach to dress—perhaps a light jacket over a cozy sweater, ensuring you can adapt as the day unfolds. 

As we move into the afternoon, expect the clouds to part, yielding to glimpses of blue as the sun climbs higher. Temperatures will unfurl towards 61, perfect for a pleasant stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet moment in one of the many cafés with views of the bustling streets below. Keep an eye on the horizon, where the fog may linger in wisps, hinting at the marine layer’s return as evening descends. This day is a tapestry of the gentle coolness and a teasing warmth—a quilt of urban exploration and serene reflection, your afternoon inviting the simplicity of enjoying a book in a park or the lively chatter of friends at one of the many outdoor tables, all wrapped in the unique charm of this vibrant city.
